channel.title: cocoapods on プログラマー備忘録
channel.description: Recent content in cocoapods on プログラマー備忘録

item.title: pod setup で SSLエラー
item.description: 0.環境 [OS] Mac OS X 10.11.4 [cocoapods] 1.0.0.beta.6 1.エラー内容 pod setupを実行すると下記エラーが発生。 $ pod setup --verbose Setting up CocoaPods master repo Cloning spec repo `master` from `https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git` (branch `master`) $ /usr/bin/git clone https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git master Cloning into 'master'... fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git/': SSLRead() return error -9806 [!] /usr/bin/git clone https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git master Cloning into 'master'... fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git/': SSLRead() return error -9806 ： 【省略】 ： 2.
